task: Input: processed MERFISH AnnData (mouse brain) with cell-type labels in adata.obs (e.g., 'cell_type', 'celltype', 'cell_type_annot'). Using expression-only data, subset cells labeled ASTROCYTE. Perform a two-group t-test differential expression comparing 90wk (OLD) vs 4wk (JUVENILE) within ASTROCYTE (logFC > 0 for OLD, adj p ≤ 0.05). Rank genes by logFC then −log₁₀(p_adj); convert to UPPERCASE gene symbols; deduplicate and remove Ensembl IDs. Return a JSON object with fields: cell_types_predicted (list of the top 13 OLD-upregulated gene symbols)

scoring.description: Pass if Jaccard ≥ 0.50 (~≥80% GT overlap using top-13).
